CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To simplify the calculation , one repeating unit of each polymer was used as the model compound , and long alkyl substituents were replaced by the ethyl group.

Let's think step by step.

1. polymer

The term "polymer" is a type of material, specifically a material made up of long chains of repeating units. In this context, it is the material being referred to when the author mentions "one repeating unit of each polymer."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To simplify the calculation , one repeating unit of each polymer was used as the model compound , and long alkyl substituents were replaced by the ethyl group.

Let's think step by step.

1. one repeating unit of each polymer
2. long alkyl substituents
3. ethyl group

These are the entities that can be considered as "Property Name" as they refer to specific chemical structures or components of the polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. one repeating unit of each polymer

This entity can be considered as a Material Property as it refers to a specific structural unit of a polymer. The other entities, "long alkyl substituents" and "ethyl group," are not Material Properties, but rather chemical structures that are being modified.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| one repeating unit of each polymer |
